data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3087951,"name":"Elliot Scher","username":"Gandagorn","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gandagorn/{size}/267112_2.png","created_at":"2022-10-11T13:35:32.989Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eSo our team is going to use a sendable chooser for the first time to pick an auto before matches in our offseason competition. We have the code written but we’re not sure when we need to pick which auto we want before a match. Should we select it from the dropdown menu before we plug the computer into the driver station? Or does it not matter?\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2022-10-11T13:35:32.989Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":9,"reads":225,"readers_count":224,"score":90.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":416012,"topic_slug":"when-to-pick-an-auto-with-sendable-chooser-before-a-match","display_username":"Elliot Scher","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49423,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2815A (19-23) | 190M (23...)"},"post_url":"/t/when-to-pick-an-auto-with-sendable-chooser-before-a-match/416012/1","custom_user_title":"2815A (19-23) | 190M (23...)","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3087953,"name":"Peter Johnson","username":"Peter_Johnson","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/peter_johnson/{size}/10417_2.png","created_at":"2022-10-11T13:38:20.657Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eTypically it’s best to do after the DS is plugged in and connected to the robot.  In most of the dashboards there’s a visual indication that the robot has “confirmed” (echoed back) the chooser setting, so making the change when you’re already connected is the easiest way to make sure you confirm it at the same time you set it, rather than that being two separate OHara","username":"Emerson1706","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emerson1706/{size}/174702_2.png","created_at":"2022-10-11T14:20:50.096Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eAs others have said we try to always select (even when it has a green checkmark in shuffleboard) while waiting behind the glass (sometimes this means having to reload a layout because its “greyed-out”) and hope it doesn’t get stuck loading, usually its fast enough that I can stay out on the field and make sure everything (limelight, roboRIO, etc) all connect properly before leaving the field while the drivers give me a thumbs up that everything is good on the selection. Obviously getting on the field fast gives you more time to make sure everything is good.
